original_text: Samson went down to Timnah together with his father and mother. As they approached the vineyards of Timnah, suddenly a young lion came roaring toward him.
korean_text: 삼손이 그의 부모와 함께 딤나에 내려가 딤나의 포도원에 이른즉 젊은 사자가 그를 보고 소리 지르는지라

sentences.original_text: together with his father and mother
As they approached the vineyards of Timnah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 딤나의 포도원에 가까이 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: suddenly a young lion came roaring
